title: Database Setup (SQLite/Room) & Serialization
description: Generic Hybrid Schema for dynamic form support. Strategy: System Columns (indexed for sorting/filtering: _uuid, assetUid, _id, submissionTime, submittedBy) + JSON Blob (rawData stores full dynamic payload). Detail screens parse rawData as key-value pairs for display. Supports ANY form type without schema-specific columns. Based on UI First: UI built with mock data, now implementing actual persistence layer.
